The Upper Clyde poems are from a sequence originally com  missioned by the Glasgow Herald which appeared, with photographs by Edward Jones, as a Weekender feature on 3 December 1994. \u2018Strangers in the Night\u2019 was commissioned for Fallen Angels by Jack Vettriano and W.
